header.descripcion: Transforming ideas into reality through clean code and innovative solutions

sobremi.descripcion1: I'm Josué Zea, Mid FullStack Developer and Software Engineer with over 3 years of experience in scalable enterprise solutions. Specialist in JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Node.js and AWS cloud architectures.
sobremi.descripcion2: Experience in critical systems optimization, complex problem solving and technical team leadership. Passionate about technological innovation and continuous improvement.
sobremi.descripcion3: Innovative and proactive, capable of designing, creating and maintaining attractive and interactive websites. I adapt to team needs and meet established objectives.

tecnologias.name: Technologies
tecnologias.description: Expert in integrating different languages, frameworks and services in modern environments, ensuring that solutions are stable, secure and easy to maintain.

uxdesign.name: UX/UI Design
uxdesign.description: Ability to transform business needs into clear and attractive interfaces, prioritizing usability and accessibility to improve user experience.

fullstack.name: FullStack Development
fullstack.description: End-to-end product development, from backend to interface, taking care of performance, scalability and code quality at every stage.

footer.slogan: Transforming ideas into reality through clean code and innovative solutions

contacto.completaTodoElFormulario: Please fill out all fields in the form.

bolsaEmpleo.descripcion: McDonald’s Job Board, a project designed to connect candidates with the employment opportunities available at the company.

celebraciones.descripcion: McDonald’s website for booking and quoting children’s birthday parties at its restaurants.

inventario.descripcion: Application developed to manage a company’s applications, their documentation, manuals, and more.

sitioInstitucional.descripcion: Corporate website for McDonald’s Mesoamerica, showcasing information about the company, its values, history, promotions, and relevant news.

miPos.descripcion: Mobile application to process order payments using the Bac Credomatic SDK.

RadiHola.descripcion: Mobile application to listen to Guatemalan national radio stations, stream podcasts, and play pre-recorded shows.

evisor.descripcion: Web application dedicated to digitizing documents for the Guatemalan Mercantile Registry, centralizing all documents on this platform.

trace.descripcion: Web application focused on tracking tickets and monitoring the status of requests for the Guatemalan Mercantile Registry.

modoFamilia.descripcion: Web application featuring different recreational activities related to McDonald’s to enjoy with the whole family.

monitorFraudes.descripcion: Web application dedicated to detecting and preventing fraud in orders and user actions in real time.

kubernetes.descripcion: Kodekloud course on Kubernetes. A practical introduction to container orchestration and deploying applications on clusters.

cloudComputing.descripcion: Google Cloud fundamentals course. Explains service models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS) and the value of scalability.

linuxEssentials.descripcion: NDG Linux fundamentals course. Covers basic commands, file structure, and the importance of open-source software in IT environments.

pythonCore.descripcion: Sololearn Python course. Introduction to programming with syntax, data structures, and essential development concepts.

cybersecurity.descripcion: Cisco networking fundamentals course. Teaches cybersecurity concepts, common threats, and basic digital protection practices.

scrum.descripcion: CertiProf certification in Scrum. Covers agile principles, roles, events, and artifacts for effective project management.

sql.descripcion: SQL fundamentals course. Teaches basic queries, database manipulation, and relational modeling concepts.
